title: FLIP: Towards Rational Discovery of Biased GPCR Ligands
impactText: At this stage of the grant (8 months into it) we don't have major research findings to report and thus a narrative of impact at this time is not really possible.
findingsText: It is very much early days, but we have developed a method to screen for beta-arrestin biased pathway compounds. These have been arrived at via computational methods and are currently undergoing assay screening to investigate potential hits further. We are only 8 months into the project and our findings/progress is in line with our initial timelines. Pharmaceuticals and Medical Biotechnology
